alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Douglas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 7:56PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Carroll and western Douglas Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 756 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Treasure Lake, or 10 miles northeast of Carrollton, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Douglasville, Villa Rica, Abilene, Winston, Lake Val-Do-Mar, Treasure Lake, Hannah, Bill Arp, and Fairplay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
